data.title: Writing Summer Camp

data.text:
Are you a word wiz, a poet, or the next best-selling novelist? Then you know that the fundamentals of writing are essential to your success. Through the exploration of different mediums such as fiction, personal narrative, and poetry, campers will build their creativity and see where the pages take them. The only limit is your imagination!

There will be no camp on Wednesday, June 19, 2024. All camps for this week have been discounted to reflect the Juneteenth federal holiday.

Details

Writing Camps are designed for students in 6th-8th grade.

Please register your camper for the grade level they have completed as of May 2024.
